name: PixelWorld
description:
Player sets off to a different world where she has to go through different troublesome adventures .

w and s keys are used to move the player forward and backward. Mouse is used to move the camera around.

There will be three types of pixel tiles ,white, red, and blue.  White tiles are constant they donot shrink.

Red tiles shrink as time passes within a limit of 30sec.  Blue tiles also shrink but with lesser time than red tiles.
